snippet: Five hypothetical situations show that for tax purposes, it’s not always easy to tell the difference between regular and capital-gains income.
abstract: N Gregory Mankiw Economic View column presents five hypothetical situations showing that, for tax purposes, it is not always easy to tell the difference between regular and capital-gains income.
lead_paragraph: Five hypothetical situations show that for tax purposes, it’s not always easy to tell the difference between regular and capital-gains income.

headline.print_headline: Capital Gains, Ordinary Income and Shades of Gray
headline.seo: Capital Gains vs. Ordinary Income - Economic View
headline.main: Capital Gains, Ordinary Income and Shades of Gray
